subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After the 2006 signing of Kei Igawa became an expensive disappointment, the Yankees hope history does not repeat itself as they get ready to jump into the free-agent sweepstakes for Masahiro Tanaka.
snippet: After the 2006 signing of Kei Igawa became an expensive disappointment, the Yankees hope history does not repeat itself as they get ready to jump into the free-agent sweepstakes for Masahiro Tanaka.
